data.name: Pixiv Dark Theme 2020-02-24
data.description:
22/02/2020 I'm doing again the desging. Work in progress:  https://i.imgur.com/EJa9Jwv.jpg
Probably cyan as secondary color and making structure changes.
24/02/2020 Still in progress. Style updated with the index, profile, illustration page, search and following page.

data.name: True Dark Mode
data.description:
This userstyle will turn most if not all menus that are currently white, black.

Cause I hate when I browese in dark mode, in the dark, and menus burn out my eyes. ;P
